mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ENTRY_EXIT_LIST EEL LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (EEL.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE EEL.STATUS = '입차'
AND START_TIME <= SYSDATE +1
AND START_TIME <= SYSDATE - 7
AND START_TIME <= SYSDATE - 30
AND START_TIME <= SYSDATE - 90
AND START_TIME <= SYSDATE - 180
AND START_TIME <= SYSDATE - 365

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ENTRY_EXIT_LIST EEL LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (EEL.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE EEL.STATUS = '출차'
AND END_TIME <= SYSDATE +1
AND END_TIME <= SYSDATE - 7
AND END_TIME <= SYSDATE - 30
AND END_TIME <= SYSDATE - 90
AND END_TIME <= SYSDATE - 180
AND END_TIME <= SYSDATE - 365

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ENTRY_EXIT_LIST EEL LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (EEL.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO)
AND START_TIME <= SYSDATE +1
AND START_TIME <= SYSDATE - 7
AND START_TIME <= SYSDATE - 30
AND START_TIME <= SYSDATE - 90
AND START_TIME <= SYSDATE - 180
AND START_TIME <= SYSDATE - 365
